title: Flood elevation certificates (FEMA)
dataVerified: Property owner, address, surveyor, elevation data, FEMA zone
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Certificate status (valid/current). Link to licensed surveyor system (owner and insurance, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fraudulent elevation certificates. Domain binding verifies licensed surveyor. FEMA forms suitable for OCR. Permanent flood risk records. Required for flood insurance. Prevents insurance fraud.
